subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] Oh Bruce...

Those are old schematics, this is what I do now. 
 
 Frank-S


To: EVP-ITC=
@yahoogroups.comFrom: ghostchasingfool@...: Thu, 15 Nov 2007 11:1=
5:24 -0800Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Oh Bruce...




Hey Zack:
                =
  I have had the schematics for about 2 years now, but I am not mechanical =
inclined myself to build one.  I have strong convictions regarding the boxe=
s, having been up close and personal (shall we say) on several different oc=
casions.  I have analyzed EVP from many locations and still strongly believ=
e that the box does not work for everyone.  I believe that your intentions =
are good giving our conversations in the past and wish you the very best wi=
th assembly.
 
See, I believe that the guilds know what your intentions are=
, and the sincerity behind your work and come through to those who have the=
ir best interest at heart.  I know that you probably think I am crazy, but =
in viewing some who currently posses the devices and having changed their p=
ath for their own agenda, its not going to be what they in vision it to be.=
  I think they could open Pandora Box and the world in which they know it w=
ill come crashing down upon their own accord.
 
I know the other side knows=
, and will help those in furthering their studies as they see fit.  I can o=
nly say, that the respect I have for the boxes and Frank will always remain=
, and I can lay my head upon my pillow at night with my integrity in take. =
 When I should have a box, I will know, and until then, I have the pleasure=
 to listen and read everyones data and studies!
 
Juli
 
Zack Widup <w9sz@p=
rairienet.org> wrote:


Hi Juli,Good to see you here!Frank has graciously p=
rovided the schematics and other data for building one. He also gave some i=
nfo on modifications recently. We were discussing making a circuit board th=
at uses small surface-mount parts. I can make boards that are far cheaper t=
han ExpressPCB.Adjusting them is another matter. I have some of this work p=
lanned as 'winter projects' when I can't get outside and do things. I am gu=
essing learning how to adjust them properly is hard-won experience.I do agr=
ee they should not just be given to someone who has no idea how to use them=
. If I end up being able to make the boards easily, it would be just for th=
is group. I wouldn't make any money at it, either.ZackOn Thu, 15 Nov 2007, =
juli velazquez wrote:> I agree! I rarely post, but as I just wrote Frank un=
der separate cover, it is all about respect!> Respect for Frank, respect fo=
r the unknown, and the pure intentions that must go along with the right of=
 ownership!>> I could have had a box build long ago, but I can honestly tel=
l you that if it didn't come under Franks direction, or the directions of t=
he guilds, then to me I shouldn't have one.>> See what the others fail to s=
ee is the true mean of messages conveyed from these devises. For the unknow=
n to correspond these messages are of great importance, and not all people =
can not understand the depth in the meanings. I can only hope that they do =
not work for those who are not worthy, and that those who shall come in pos=
session who are sincere will utilize it in all position manners never expec=
ting personal gain!>>>>>> Frank Ratka <warrior18eii@...> wrote:> I re=
alize the time it takes to put things together. Especially units built from=
 the ground up but if you are taking on the duty of spreading the technolog=
y to help mankind, to me it would be a labor of love. I can see and accept =
recovering production costs even, but this guy is looking to make a huge pr=
ofit.>> You gained your respect and credibility on the fact that you have a=
 system that works and you are willing to give it away when you didn't have=
 to Frank. This guy is coming out of the gate with a cheap imitation of EVP=
 maker and your system (both of which are free) and putting a huge price ta=
g on it. It just don't sit right with me!>> Honestly, I know it is none of =
my business what Ron does but I guess I just needed to register my protest =
with this seemingly blatant attempt at exploiting good though naive people.=
>> Regards,>> Frank R.>

The contents of this eletronic correspondence is p=
rivate & confidential and meant only for the party and/or parties it is add=
ressed to.  
 
No part of this email transmission may be publicly posted or=
 forwarded to other parties without explicit written permission.
